description: Innovation & change keynote speaker. Author of http://charting-change.com and http://innovationbonfire.com, creator of Change Planning Toolkit™  http://bradenkelley.com/cpt
Author of @leanchangeorg and @enableagility founder of @sparkconfto drummer for @cleverweaponbnd. Once called a shit disturber by my manager.
Founder and Chairman at @KotterIntl, Professor of Leadership at Harvard Business School, New York Times best selling author.
Keynote Speaker, Innovative Education Consultant, Leadership Coach, Educator. Love to learn, laugh, connect, and make completos.
Twitter’s #1 #ChangeManagement #KOL Influencing & Problem-solving, IT Owner, Speaker, Trainer, Writer, Analogy King, Thought Provocateur & Originator, Runner

Professor Emeritus, OISE/University of Toronto.
Whole system reform devotee
Founder of Leadership IQ, NY Times bestseller, contributor at Forbes. Books include Hiring for Attitude, Hundred Percenters, HARD Goals. #LeadershipIQ
PFG Speaks. Change Management Keynote Speaker, Author of the Leadership of Change Volumes 1 - 3   and Troubleshooter http://peterfgallagher.com/publications

Diversity/Inclusion, Change Mgmt, Talent/OD  - Author: Listening To Millennials: 56 Priceless Tips For Managers- 
@DiversityWisdom- http://TeenDIVERSOPHY.com
BCG Senior Partner. Works with government on change, new ways of working, technology, organisation
